Detailed Description

static class to perform asymmetric ciphers, using asymmetric keys (eg.

RSA keys)

Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ Padding

enum AsymmetricCipher::Padding

supported padding values to perform asymmetric ciphers.

Default: PKCS1.
